components.name: Layout
components.description: Root layout component that defines the page structure with proper RTL support for Hebrew

components.name: HeroSection
components.description: Main hero section showcasing the clothing store's brand with headline and CTA

components.name: FeaturedProducts
components.description: Showcase of featured clothing products with images, names, and prices

components.name: ServicesSection
components.description: Section highlighting the clothing store's special services

components.name: BookingSystem
components.description: Interactive appointment booking system with form

components.name: PortfolioGallery
components.description: Visual gallery showcasing the store's clothing collections and fashion styles

components.name: FAQSection
components.description: Frequently asked questions with expandable answers

components.name: TestimonialsCarousel
components.description: Carousel displaying customer reviews and testimonials

components.name: CTASection
components.description: Call-to-action section encouraging store visits or appointments

components.name: Footer
components.description: Page footer with contact information, social links, and copyright

components.name: Navbar
components.description: Responsive navigation bar with logo, menu, and action buttons

components.name: AboutSection
components.description: Section highlighting the store's history, mission, and values

components.name: FeaturesGrid
components.description: Grid showcasing the store's unique selling points and features

components.name: NewsletterSignup
components.description: Email newsletter signup form with promotional offer

components.name: LocationMap
components.description: Interactive map showing the store location with contact details
